[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:

Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]

I hung up some more lights and candles today.
That's lovely! I always feel so cozy and comfortable when you do that.

[MEMORY]

I can't wait to go inside and warm up. ### Husband: I know, but I really love this weather. After being stuck inside all day at work, it feels great to be outside and soak up some sun. ### Wife: Speaking of being outside, remember when you had to run to catch the bus a couple of years ago? That was pretty funny. ### Husband: Yeah, I was really lucky to make it on time. I don't think I could have handled waiting in the cold for another bus to come.' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Current happiness and contentment', 'Related Summaries': 'Husband expresses happiness and contentment from being outside and enjoying the weather.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Husband: Thanks, it really does make a difference in my overall happiness and contentment. Speaking of which, I'm feeling pretty happy right now just being outside in this beautiful weather. ### Wife: Yeah, I can see that. Even though it's cold, it's nice to see you enjoying yourself so much.' }
